website_summaries.verdict: The Adidas EQT Racing ADV's low top silhouette embodies its vintage origin with present-day design and technology. With its previous equipment roots, the shoe took its prior features and morphed it into a vessel of an everyday lifestyle wear.The shoe coincides with recent Adidas sneaker releases when it comes to comfort. Maintaining its 90s goal of keeping everything essential, this sneaker stayed faithful to its forefather by signifying its legacy of functionality while adding a modern style.
pros: Several customers loved the overall package of the shoe
A handful of reviewers experienced an excellent fit when trying the shoe on
A couple of users were happy with the shoe's excellent value for money
The Adidas EQT Racing ADV, with its premium function and contemporary style, had encouraged many buyers to recommend the shoe to other potential customers

A lot of buyers were satisfied with the shoe's comfort provided by the stretch knitted mesh upper for inline comfort coupled with an OrthoLite® insole for added cushioning while maintaining an odor-free wear
One user even pointed out the shoe's versatility in matching with outfits and activities like wearing it in the gym and also at the office
A modern upgrade of the EQT Racing 93 model, the Adidas EQT Racing ADV amplified several of the origins accents that catered to the tastes of many users
cons: Few wearers complained about the discomfort they get from the tongue of the shoe which seems like pressing hard on the front of their ankle

customer_reviews.title: First time I give a pair of adidas 2 stars.
customer_reviews.text: The box came smashed. The shoe looks like it was pre owned, it had some kind of animal fur all over the shoes and they have marks on the sides. I’m actually a bit disappointed. I even waited for these to come back into stock. I may return them if I can find a better pair
customer_reviews.author: ALou

customer_reviews.title: Favorite shoes
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite shoes. I wear them almost everyday. They are very comfy and fit as expected. I don’t run in them, but they work great for every day wear. I will definitely buy another pair in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Micaela

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I walk for exercise and they don't hurt my feet, could use a little more arch support but they're good.
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: Yellow soles
customer_reviews.text: The soles were a yellowish tint, not white! They looked dirty. I have the all white with blue & they do not have the discoloration on them. These were returned.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: The way it fit
customer_reviews.text: Love the sneaker but just a little too small I think I should've got an 8 ...next time I will but I'm still rocking them...
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love these shows, they run a little small but still good. I use these shoes to work out. I really love them if you wear a 6, get a 6.5.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute. For a Wide foot
customer_reviews.text: Very wide for my narrow foot. Very cute shoes.. wish they fit me better!
customer_reviews.author: La

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the adidas EQT this is my third pair. Typically I wear a 7 - these run a little Big the 6.5 is PERFECT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn K.

customer_reviews.title: Great look and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great price, look and fit. Couldn’t have asked for a better pair of sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Kimbo

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I really love these shoes. They are comfy. I get compliments on them often. They’re cute. Zero complaints. Ordered the same style but different colors. High recommend, true to size.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Run big
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors. Order a half or full size smaller, they definitely run big.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L Ferlito

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I just opened them today and the back is already peeling.
customer_reviews.author: Paola Topete

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, comfortable, not best workout shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoes look great, received a lot of compliments when person purchased for was wearing them. Had a lot of success with other models of Adidas running shoes and wanted to continue the success. The reason this gets a 4 Star is because they aren’t really the best workout shoes. They are extremely comfortable though.
customer_reviews.author: John Hartlieb

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes very comfy
customer_reviews.text: I am super happy I bought these! They are stylish and comfortable. I am a women’s 8 and ordered a women’s 8 and they fit true to size. The color combo I ordered was black and mint and I am very happy with the choice. I bought these as my next gym shoes but really they could be easily worn as everyday sneakers. Pleasantly surprised also with the shipper Shoebacca, shoe box was nicely inserted in perfectly sized company shipper box and I received a promo code for my next order on a thank you card.
customer_reviews.author: RoxShinobi

customer_reviews.title: Would be great if they didn't slip off!
customer_reviews.text: Pro's: awesome breathable upper fabric, comfy sole and laces up nicely. Nice colors. Con's: constant heel slipping so much so I'll have to return. There is some padding at the heel which though there for comfort, allows for lots of heel slipping. Usually wear a size 10 or 10.5! Got a size 9.5 because they were so long and the width could have been a bit more balanced. It's slightly narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Kimfit

product_meta.title: Adidas Women's EQT Racing ADV Originals Training Shoe
product_meta.description: Drawing inspiration from the '90s Equipment runner these adidas Originals EQT Racing ADV sneakers are a great addition to any rotation..
feature_bullets: Iconic 3-Stripe design on each side creates the classic adidas style
TPU support piece wraps around heel for maximum support
Sock-like structure adds stability and support
